Quaternion Function Reference

ifftshift

Inverse FFT shift.
(Quaternion overloading of standard MATLAB® function)

Syntax

Y = ifftshift(X, dim)

Description

ifftshift overloads the MATLAB® function of the same name and implements the same functionality, for quaternion arrays.

See Also

QTFM function: fftshift
MATLAB® function: ifftshift
